name: Jaime L. Garcia
text:
Best parts:
- Landscaping and framing of the drawing. That arch is cool.
- The rocks. The rocks with moss. All the rocks.
- People feel like they just have the right detail.

Comments:
I think the river water could be less "wavey" and more river rushy. That said, I'm no artist, so I wouldn't know how to render the water. =/
